data.quote: The life in front of you is far more important than the life behind you.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: If you don't imagine, nothing ever happens at all.
data.author: John Green

data.quote: The mind is everything, What you think you become.
data.author: Gautam buddha

data.quote: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.quote: We shine the brightest in our darkest days.
data.author: Aman Raj, Thegaietythoughts

data.quote: If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
data.author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

data.quote: There is no magic to achievement. It's really about hard work, choices and persistence.
data.author: Michelle Obama

data.quote: Today is your opportunity to build the tomorrow you want.
data.author: Ken Poirot

data.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
data.author: Nelson Mandela
